text: Nikas may refer to: __NOTOC__ == Surname == *Ilias Nikas (born 1964), Greek judoka *Panny Nikas (born 1988), Australian footballer == Given name == *Nikas Safronov (born 1956), Soviet and Russian artist == Places == *Tulsiyahi Nikas, is a village development committee in Dhanusa District in the Janakpur Zone of south-eastern Nepal == See also == *Hisab Nikas, is an Odia film *Nika (disambiguation)
title: Nikas
